Verify The Application allows to copy and paste of large trees
Verify The Application allows to cut and paste of large trees
Verify The Application allows to copy and paste content with specific and shared components
Verify The dependency calculation for what refers to an item
Verify The dependency calculation for what an item refers to
Verify that studio allows to rename content via Form (page.xml move name)
Verify that studio allows to cut and paste content to folder (page.xml move to folder)
Verify that studio allows to copy and paste content to folder (page.xml copy to folder)
Verify that studio allows to copy and paste content to folder with collision and duplicate
Verify that studio allows to rename content via Form (page move name rename)
Verify that studio allows to cut and paste content to folder (page move to folder)
Verify that studio allows to copy and paste content to folder (page copy to folder)
Verify that studio allows to copy and paste content to folder with collision and duplicate (page copy to folder)
Verify The Application allows to rename file and publish it (file.xml rename and publish)
Verify The Application allows to rename file and publish it (page rename and publish)
Verify The Application allows to rename, rename again and publish it (file.xml rename, rename and publish)
Verify The Application allows to rename, rename again and publish it (Page rename, rename and publish)
Verify The Application allows to rename file and publish it, later rename and delete it (file.xml rename and publish, later rename and delete)
Verify The Application allows to rename page and publish it, later rename and delete it (Page rename and publish, later rename and delete)
Verify that the application allows to bulk upload assets correctly
Verify that the image crop works correctly
Verify that the save as draft works correctly
Verify that the application displays the proper content state when content changes are performed
Verify that the application allows to publish properly a new content when user creates a new content page
Verify that the application allows to unlock the locked contents when the Unlock option is clicked on the right click menu
Verify that the application displays as locked a content when that content is being edited by another user
Verify that the application allows to change the content template when the Change Template option is clicked on the rightclick menu
Verify that the application allows to see the history of a content when the History option is clicked on the rightclick menu
Verify that the application displays as read-only all the fields on the View form when the View option is clicked on the right click options
Verify that the application displays the proper content information on the mouse-over tooltip
Verify that the application displays the preview for a content when a content is clicked on the Pages structure
Verify that the copy operation handles dependencies and page/component specific assets
Verify that the duplicate operation handles dependencies and page/component specific assets

Verify that the compare history works properly
Verify that the application displays the proper set of available options on the top bar for a selected content page
